sourcesContent:
AngTangle.module "app", [] AngTangle.filter -> LogTime = (date) -> hh = right "#{date.getHours()}", 2, 0 mm = right "#{date.getMinutes()}", 2, 0 ss = right "#{date.getSeconds()}", 2, 0 return "#{hh}:#{mm}:#{ss}" #------------------------------------------------------------------------------- right = (string, len, pad) -> while string.length < len string = "#{pad}#{string}" return string AngTangle.config routes = ($routeProvider, views) -> addRoute = (name, url="/#{name}") -> $routeProvider.when url, template: views["views/#{name}"] controller: name $routeProvider.otherwise redirectTo: "/" addRoute "home", "/" addRoute "messages" AngTangle.service class Logger #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- constructor: () -> @_verbose = false @_messages = [] #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- getMessages: () -> return @_messages #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- verbose: (value) -> return @_verbose if !value? @_verbose = !!value return @_verbose #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- log: (text) -> date = new Date @_messages.push {date, text} return #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- vlog: (text) -> return unless @_verbose log text return #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- clear: -> @_messages.splice 0, @_messages.length AngTangle.controller body = ($scope, Logger) -> Logger.log "created body controller" $scope.messages = Logger.getMessages() subTitle = "" $scope.getSubtitle = -> return "" if subTitle is "" return ": #{subTitle}" $scope.setSubtitle = (s) -> subTitle = s AngTangle.controller home = ($scope, Logger) -> Logger.log "created home controller" $scope.setSubtitle "" AngTangle.controller messages = ($scope, Logger) -> Logger.log "created messages controller" $scope.setSubtitle "messages" $scope.messages = Logger.getMessages() $scope.clear = -> Logger.clear() return AngTangle.constant 'data', { "someData": { "x": { "y": 4, "z": 5 } } } AngTangle.constant 'views', { "views/home": "

Welcome to the home page!", "views/messages": "

\n \n
\n\n
\n no messages\n
\n\n

\n\n\n \n
{{message.date | LogTime}}\n {{message.text}}\n
\n" }
